Women are attracted to the sense of security and stability provided by a mature man. And men are biologically programmed to love a woman who is young, healthy and fertile - which has the necessary conditions to produce offspring.

Many men prefer to be dating younger women. But they are nervous about trying to meet younger women and get dates with them, because they feel they are "too old" to be attractive to them. It 'true. Over the last 200 years of history, the U.S. government has taken statistics at the age of couples getting married. And every year, is greater than the age difference between men and women who marry each other.

Each year, the boys a little older, and women get a little younger.

In fact, when guys get married a second time, married women who are 10 years younger on average.

You might be surprised to know that when men get married for the second time in 20% of cases marry women who are 20 years younger or older.

But it's not just about sex and having children. Studies have shown that dating a younger woman increases the life of man. The youthful energy of a young woman rubbed off on you (literally) and makes you act young and have a younger perspective on life.

OK, now we talk about younger women. In fact, what direction they have the desire?

Answer: A man, a man healthy, safe, secure and emotionally stable.

I said nothing of being tall, handsome, and rich or have six-pack abs. I said masculinity, security, and stability.

There are reasons for this.

Women are programmed to seek safety and to provide the best means of raising the child, and it's a safe bet that the older man has grown into the world of information, and other important goods such as personal skills and experiences of life in more.

The company seems to force the view that older men who are "chasing" the younger woman. However, in most cases, women seeking older men to date.

Young women are wired to find very attractive qualities.

Of course, it could be physically attracted some 25 years 'bad boy' who has more tattoos than his ambitions. But she does not feel long-term safety and attraction of this type.

She wants a man in her life that has life experience and sophistication, and can provide the emotional strength as she goes through her emotional drama. She wants a man who has a plan in life.
